0.post_text: Not sure what you are missing out on this very last weekend of BMW Performance Fest 2017? Here is a peek at the food and activities in store. There's still one more day left! See you tomorrow at Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road. #Performance1toi

1.post_text:
Join us at Performance Motors for the final weekend of BMW Performance Fest 2017 today to receive your complimentary Her World Magazine*!

*Redemption is valid for one per customer only (hard copy or digital copy). 
*First-come-first served basis, while stocks last. 
*Other terms and conditions apply.
1.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

2.post_text:
Shift your excitement into high gear for this last week of BMW Performance Fest 2017. With preferential rates on a wide range of BMW Demo Cars and exclusive promotions, there is no better time to get your hands on your favourite BMW!

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to find out more today.
2.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

3.post_text:
In celebration of family and fathers, we saw many families join us at BMW Performance Fest 2017 to commemorate Father's Day last weekend!
 
Families were treated to delicious food from Bao Makers alongside artisanal drop coffee and cold brew from King's Cart Coffee and Coffee Break. Jean Yip Singapore was also present to pamper and indulge.
 
We hope you've enjoyed the BMW Performance Fest thus far. 
Do not miss out on the last week of BMW Performance Fest 2017 happening this coming weekend, 24 June 2017 to 26 June 2017!
#Performance1toi
3.story: BMW Singapore added 139 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

4.post_text:
Ramp up your road style with the new BMW 4 Series, now with two new exterior colours - Sunset Orange and Snapper Rocks Blue. What's more, enjoy enhanced visibility and safety with Bi-LED headlights at the front and full LED technology at the rear. 

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 for a test drive now! 

The new BMW 4 Series comes in the following variants - the BMW 420i Gran Coupé Sport, BMW 420i Coupé Sport and BMW 420i Convertible.

comments.message: Anything  related to   is so important

4.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

5.post_text:
Dads are every son's first hero, and every daughter's first love. 
This Father's Day, head on down to Performance Motors to treat your Dad to an unforgettable gift!
5.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

6.post_text:
BMW Performance Fest 2017 is underway this weekend at Performance Motors as we celebrate Father's Day with the family.

Do not miss out on the many food and activities over this joyous weekend. Join us at Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road tomorrow! #Performance1toi
6.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

7.post_text:
There is no better time to enjoy exciting offers than at the BMW Performance Fest 2017. Drive home your favourite BMW and take advantage of the BMW 5-year Extended Warranty* today. Or, lease one from just $50/day with $0 downpayment*.
 
What’s more? You can also treat your family to a host of fun-filled activities for a weekend they will definitely remember.
 
Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 today.
 
*Terms and conditions apply.
7.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

8.post_text:
Learn more about how BMW ConnectedDrive through the Product Sharing Session conducted by our BMW Geniuses during the upcoming Performance Motors Roadshow!

Date: 20 June 2017, Tuesday
Duration: 5pm to 6pm.
Location: VivoCity Singapore Central Court A, Level 1

Sign up here: 
http://www.pml.com.sg/ProductSharingSession/

9.post_text:
Thank you all for joining us on Escape The City 2017, the first-ever drive/ride away with BMW 2 Series Gran Tourer and BMW Motorrad! We hope you had fun as much fun as we did on our journey to Lexis Hibiscus, Port Dickson. 

Click through the album to relive the adventure. #EscapeTheCity2017

location.street: 12th Mile, Jalan Pantai, Port Dickson, Pasir Panjang

9.story: BMW Singapore added 118 new photos — at Lexis Hibiscus Port Dickson.

10.post_text:
Surprise Dad this Father’s Day with a gift from the specially curated BMW Collection. 

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road to view the full collection and find out more about these exclusive discounts. 
Promotion ends 18 July 2017.
10.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

11.post_text:
We would like to express a big thank you to all who joined us for Performance Motors Escape The City 2017. We hope that everyone enjoyed themselves and made new memories!

Do check back for more official photos from the trip in the coming week.
#EscapeTheCity2017

12.post_text:
Ladies, we hope you enjoyed week 3 of the BMW Performance Fest 2017, where we celebrated the modern empowered women!

Guests indulged in delightful treats from Park Bench Deli and yummy buns from Bao Makers, while The 1872 Clipper Tea Co. offered aromatic teas that complemented the superfruit smoothies served up by Daily Acai, courtesy of Coffee Break.
 
Attendees also had the chance to create animated photographs with our looper photo booth, and learnt how to create DIY floral air fresheners for their cars by The Little Flower Shop
 
Missed this week's event? Be sure to come down for the next instalment of BMW Performance Fest, happening from 16 June 2017 to 22 June 2017.
#Performance1toi
12.story: BMW Singapore added 50 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

13.post_text: They say life is either an adventure or nothing at all. This past weekend, we escaped the city and journeyed with BMW drivers and riders to be one with the sea, sun, and sand at the Lexis Hibiscus, Port Dickson. Click through the album to see the adventure through the eyes of our participants! #EscapeTheCity2017

location.street: 12th Mile, Jalan Pantai, Port Dickson, Pasir Panjang

comments.message: How add more photo into this album

13.story: BMW Singapore added 22 new photos — with Fiqi Agus Utoro at Lexis Hibiscus Port Dickson.

14.post_text:
This week, we celebrate the success of the modern, empowered woman at BMW Performance Fest 2017 - Week 3 by presenting special deals on our entire range of BMWs. Additionally, enjoy the BMW Extended Warranty for 5 years* with each purchase.

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to find out more.
14.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

15.post_text:
We've come to week three of the BMW Performance Fest 2017! Can you guess what this week's theme is? 

Tell us in a comment below!

comments.message:

15.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

16.post_text:
We've come to the midpoint of the BMW Performance Fest 2017, and we hope you're enjoying it as much as we are! 
This past weekend, adventure-seekers scaled to great heights on Kinetics Climbing's rock-climbing wall and created their own customisable survival paracord bracelets. 

Didn't manage to get in on the fun? Be sure to join us next week at Performance Motors for more thrilling experiences.
16.story: BMW Singapore added 22 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

17.post_text:
Seeking your next adventure? 
Join us in an Exclusive Rock Climbing 101* under the guidance of certified instructors of Kinetics Climbing and scale greater heights! This introductory session will cover the different types of climbing, as well as equipment used and basic techniques.

Dates: 
7 June 2017, Wednesday 
8 June 2017, Thursday 

Time: (2 sessions each day) 
Session 1: 3pm to 4pm 
Session 2: 4:30pm to 6pm
Limited to 10 persons each session only.

Sign up now!
http://www.pml.com.sg/rockclimbing/

*Terms and conditions apply.
17.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

18.post_text:
Gear up with the latest items from the BMW Lifestyle Collection for your next adventure! 

Enjoy a variety of irresistible deals on our apparel, accessories and much more to express yourself this Great Singapore Sale.

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road to view the full collection and find out more about these exclusive discounts. 
Promotion ends 31 July 2017.
18.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

19.post_text:
It is the second day of BMW Performance Fest 2017 - Week 2. Join us in the many exciting activities we have in store you on this Sunday! It will also be a great opportunity to find out more about the promotions we have on the BMW X Range, along with other BMWs, as we celebrate limitless adventures. 

See you at Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road soon!
#Performance1toi

19.story: BMW Singapore is at BMW Singapore.

20.post_text:
At BMW Performance Fest 2017 - Week 2 this weekend, we celebrate limitless adventures with the BMW X Range. 

Here is a peek at the many exciting, fun-filled activities happening right now: a rock climbing wall set up by Kinetics Climbing, delicious sandwiches and coffee by Park Bench Deli and Coffee Break and a DIY Paracord Bracelet station! 

See you soon at Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road!
#Performance1toi
20.story: BMW Singapore added 7 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

21.post_text:
The BMW X Range is perfect for every adventure, whether you are heading to work or off on a weekend road trip. 

Drive home the BMW X3 Programme Car with savings up to $17,000*. Or lease a brand new BMW with 10% downpayment* today. 

See you at the BMW Performance Fest 2017 - Week 2 this weekend for these great deals, delectable treats and fun activities for the entire family!

*Terms and conditions apply.
#Performance1toi

24.post_text:
Here are some highlights from the first day of BMW Performance Fest 2017! Join us for Day Two tomorrow to enjoy food activities from The Juicy Way, Sprout Salad Bar, Holystic Sneaker Laundry, and The Workroom. 

Tomorrow is the also the last day of our first ever BMW Lifestyle Collection Car Boot sale. Do not miss it!
